blurb: See No Evil Monkey: Small moulded monkey figure in red earthenware clay. Anagama fired.
Straight-edged bowl: Small, straight-edged bowl in red earthen ware clay. Anagama fired.
Wabi Sabi tea bowl: Tea bowl in red earthenware clay. Anagama fired.
Ridged bottle form: Medium size, hand-built bottle with ridge detail, poured and brushed white glaze with copper-glazed rim. Raku fired.
Straight-sided tea bowl: Wheel-thrown straight-sided tea bowl, copper glazed interior, white-glazed exterior. Raku fired.
Small pinch pot: Small pinch pot with copper-glazed interior, striped exterior. Raku fired.
Ridged tea bowl: Slab-built tea bowl with ridged detail and a glossy finish. Raku fired.
Square sake bottle set: Wheel-thrown sake bottle and three sake cups in white stoneware clay. Matt black and shino glazes. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.

Three lidded pots: Small to medium size, wheel-thrown lidded storage jars in white stoneware clay with shell and ammonite sprig decoration in buff clay, and white matt glaze. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Three small mugs: Small wheel-thrown mugs in white stoneware clay with shell and ammonite sprig decoration in buff clay, and white matt glaze. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Three small bowls: Small wheel-thrown bowls in white stoneware clay with shell and ammonite sprig decoration in buff clay, and white matt glaze. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Medium-size jug: Medium-size wheel-thrown jug in white stoneware clay with ammonite sprig decoration in buff clay, and white matt glaze. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Teapot: Small wheel-thrown teapot with lid in white stoneware clay with shell decoration in buff clay, and white matt glaze. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Two medium bowls: Medium size, wheel-thrown bowls in white stoneware clay, with light blue porcelain slip-glaze and dark blue swallow motif. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.

Nested set of three bowls (small, medium and large): Set of hand-built bowls in white stoneware clay, slip-glazed with light blue porcelain and decorated with painted dark blue school of fish. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.

Large hand-built bowl in white stoneware clay: Large hand-built bowl in white stoneware clay, slip-glazed with light blue porcelain and decorated with painted dark blue school of fish. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln
Medium-sized round wheel-thrown teapot in white stoneware clay, with layered glazing of midnight blue and rutile. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Small, straight-sided wheel-thrown and carved teapot and cups in white stoneware clay, with matt black exterior glaze and red interior glaze. Fired to stoneware in electric kiln.
Small, round wheel-thrown and carved teapot in white stoneware clay, with green celadon glaze. Fired to stoneware in gas kiln (reduction).
